name: Shreya Polymers Private Limited
overview:
Established in year 2004, Shreya Polymers Private Limited is an ISO 9001:2008 certified manufacturers, suppliers & exporters of a supreme quality array of Industrial Tanks, Machine & Expansion Joints.

Our Vision: We believe that performance is the only language of Quality. The quality in designing, manufacturing process and workmanship, result to greater performance and productivity.

Our Mission: “Our mission is to emerge as global leader through quality products, to achieve the customer satisfaction as well as continual improvement through analysis of product & process.”

About the Owner: Our organization has been able to achieve greater heights with the gracious guidance of our mentor Mr. Sunil Kumar.

Memberships / Affiliations: We are an ISO 9001:2008 certified firm engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a quality array of Industrial Tanks, Machine & Expansion Joints to our valued patrons.

Our Team: We are backed by a team of skilled and hardworking professionals, who are recruited on the basis of their respective domain knowledge and expertise.
